name: sweet-scent
effect: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Allures the foe to reduce
evasiveness.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Allures the foe to reduce
evasiveness.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Allures the foe to
reduce evasiveness.
It also attracts
wild POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A sweet scent that
lowers the foe’s
evasiveness. It also
lures wild Pokémon
if used in grass, etc.

A sweet scent that

flavor_text_entries.x-y:

Pokémon’s evasiveness. This also lures wild
Pokémon if used in places such as tall grass.
